sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PassengerService } from './../api/services/passenger.service'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register-passenger', templateUrl: './register-passenger.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register-passenger.component.css'] }) export class RegisterPassengerComponent { constructor(private passengerService: PassengerService, private fb:FormBuilder) { } form = this.fb.group({ email: [''], firstName: [''], lastName: [''], isFemale: [true] }) register() { console.log(this.form.value) this.passengerService.registerPassenger(); } }
